tool_description: An API Showing news about climate from top news webistes like bbc, skynews, telegraph, euronews and few others you will get minimum of 300+ articles from this api
name: climate change  articles
title: climate change  articles

api_list.name: Get news from particular website
api_list.description: Get articles about climate change from particular website
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-articles4.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-articles4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-articles4.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-articles4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
